item.title: 日本企业债券销售将在 2026 年再创辉煌
item.description: 银行家们预计，继 2025 年创纪录的债券发行量之后，今年日本公司以日元计价的公司债券销售将再创辉煌。【原文：Bankers expect another blockbuster year for sales of yen-denominated corporate debt from Japanese companies following the record tally of bonds issued in 2025.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台，华尔街追逐委内瑞拉的财富
item.description:
多年来，这个拉丁美洲国家一直是禁区。现在，贸易商和大亨们正在抢滩登陆。【原文：

For years, the Latin American country was all but off-limits. Now, traders and tycoons are pouncing.

item.title: 印度出口商面临失去美国订单的风险，除非达成一月贸易协议
item.description: 由于新德里和华盛顿之间的贸易谈判迟迟没有进展，从家居装饰到皮鞋等产品的印度出口商担心，如果他们无法在一月份锁定订单，就会错过美国的夏季购物季。【原文：Indian exporters of products ranging from home decor to leather shoes are worried about missing the US summer shopping season if they are unable to lock in orders in January as trade-deal talks drag on between New Delhi and Washington.】

item.title: 日本抗议中国新的军民两用产品出口管制措施
item.description: 中国宣布对运往日本的可能具有军事用途的物品实施出口管制，东京对此表示抗议，这是两个亚洲国家在台湾争端中外交紧张局势的最新爆发。【原文：Tokyo protested China’s announcement of export controls on items shipped to Japan that could have military uses, the latest flare up in diplomatic tension between the two Asian nations in a dispute related to Taiwan.】

item.title: 特朗普称委内瑞拉将向美国提供部分原油，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示委内瑞拉将向美国上交多达 5000 万桶原油后，原油跌幅扩大。【原文：Oil extended losses after President Donald Trump said Venezuela would turn over as many as 50 million barrels of crude to the US, which would be sold at market prices to benefit both countries.】

item.title: 交易商摒弃地缘政治风险，关注美国数据，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在连续三日上涨后趋于稳定，因为交易商将目光从加剧的地缘政治紧张局势转向了本周将公布的美国经济数据。【原文：Gold steadied after three days of gains, as traders looked beyond heightened geopolitical tensions to US economic data due this week.】

item.title: 三星牛市押注创纪录的盈利能维持 3,500 亿美元的涨势
item.description: 自去年年初以来，三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：A stock rally that has added $350 billion in market value for Samsung Electronics Co. since the start of last year may have more room to run as bullish analysts and investors eye record profits.】

item.title: 聊天平台 Discord秘密申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Discord 公司以保密方式提交了首次公开募股申请，为迅速增长的风险投资支持的科技公司上市队伍再添一员。【原文：Discord Inc. filed confidentially for an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a rapidly growing pipeline of venture capital-backed tech listings.】

item.title: 投资者称，韩国股市傲视全球的反弹只是一个开始
item.description: 韩国股票在 2025 年领跑全球市场，凭借诱人的估值、技术驱动型盈利和强有力的政府支持吸引了众多投资者，因此不乏买入呼声。【原文：South Korean stocks are seeing no shortage of buy calls after leading global markets in 2025, drawing investors with attractive valuations, tech-driven earnings and strong government support.】

item.title: 中日争端将拖累亚洲股市：市场综述
item.description: 尽管对人工智能的乐观情绪和对美联储宽松政策的预期推动美股创下新高，但亚洲股市在经历了有史以来最好的开年表现后似乎将喘口气。【原文：Asian stocks look set to take a breather after their best-ever start to a year, even as optimism over artificial intelligence and expectations of Federal Reserve easing drove US shares to a new high.】

item.title: 伯克希尔的阿贝尔担任首席执行官的第一年将加薪 19
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.该公司在周二提交的一份文件中表示，首席执行官格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）的现金年薪将达到 2500 万美元，远远超过其前任沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）数十年来在该职位上赚取的 10 万美元年薪。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Chief Executive Officer Greg Abel will earn an annual cash salary of $25 million, the firm said in a filing Tuesday, far eclipsing the $100,000 that his predecessor Warren Buffett earned for decades in the role.】

item.title: OpenAI 挑战者通过两场首秀测试中国人工智能的胃口
item.description: 本周，中国最大的两家人工智能初创企业将在香港接连亮相，检验投资者对这个在后 ChatGPT 时代蓬勃发展的行业的兴趣。然而，Zhipu 和 MiniMax 是中国最早挑战 OpenAI 等行业领导者的两家公司，它们进入公开市场的路线却截然不同。【原文：Two of China’s largest generative AI startups are set for back-to-back debuts in Hong Kong this week, testing investor appetite for an industry that blossomed in the post-ChatGPT era. Yet Zhipu and MiniMax — among the country’s earliest challengers to sector leaders including OpenAI — took very different routes to public markets.】

item.title: 看涨国债的押注目标是 10 年期国债收益率跌至 4% 以下
item.description: 国债期权交易商正加大押注，认为美国 10 年期国债收益率将突破近期区间，在未来几周跌破 4%，达到 11 月份的水平。【原文：Traders in Treasury options are boosting bets that US 10-year yields will bust out of their recent range and tumble below 4% in the coming weeks to levels last seen in November.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉是否向中国递交了台湾蓝图？
item.description:
在今天的 "亚洲大视野 "播客中，特朗普在委内瑞拉问题上的举动对中国在拉美的地位意味着什么？【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, what Trump’s move on Venezuela means for China’s place in Latin America – and the risk to Taiwan.

】

item.title: 亚马逊人工智能工具在商家不知情的情况下盲目提供产品
item.description: 圣诞节前后的某个时候，Sarah Burzio 发现她的文具生意在节假日期间销售额大增，其中包括一些神秘的新客户：来自与亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Sometime around Christmas, Sarah Burzio noticed that the holiday sales bump for her stationery business included some mysterious new customers: a flurry of orders from anonymous email addresses associated with Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 美国经济增长有望带动运输业股价跃上新高
item.description: 受今年经济强劲增长前景的推动，美国运输类股票周二收盘创下历史新高，为反弹画上了句号。【原文：US transportation stocks closed at a record level Tuesday capping off a rebound fueled by prospects of strong economic growth this year.】

item.title: Mobileye 拟以 9 亿美元收购仿人机器人制造商 Mentee
item.description: 自动驾驶汽车系统公司 Mobileye Global Inc. 将以现金加股票的方式收购以色列初创公司 Mentee Robotics，交易价值达 9 亿美元，以开发仿人机器人。【原文：Self-driving car systems company Mobileye Global Inc. is acquiring Israeli startup Mentee Robotics in a cash-and-stock deal valued at $900 million, as it looks to develop humanoid robots.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 在英伟达的支持下完成 200 亿美元融资
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI表示，它已完成了一轮200亿美元的融资，投资者包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）、Valor Equity Partners和卡塔尔投资局。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI said it has completed a $20 billion funding round from investors including Nvidia Corp., Valor Equity Partners and the Qatar Investment Authority.】

item.title: 马姆达尼抨击居住条件后，纽约市反对出售破产的出租屋
item.description: 新上任的纽约市市长佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）的住房议程正面临着首次考验，因为该市对破产出售 Pinnacle 集团拥有的数千套租金稳定的公寓表示反对，这些公寓的居民对居住条件提出了强烈抗议。【原文：Newly-inaugurated New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani’s housing agenda is facing its first test as the city balks at the bankruptcy sale of thousands of rent-stabilized apartments owned by Pinnacle Group, where residents have railed against living conditions.】

item.title: 西门子的 Busch 着眼于运营软件、人工智能和生命科学领域的 M&A
item.description: 西门子股份公司首席执行官罗兰-布施（Roland Busch）认为，人工智能、生命科学和运营软件（管理工厂的软件）领域存在交易潜力。【原文：Siemens AG Chief Executive Officer Roland Busch sees potential deals in artificial intelligence, life sciences and operations software, which runs factories.】

item.title: KBC 和 Van Lanschot Kempen 将组建股票合资企业
item.description: KBC 证券公司和 Van Lanschot Kempen 投资银行同意将其股票业务合并为一家平等的合资企业，以扩大股票覆盖面，增强在各自市场的影响力。【原文：KBC Securities and Van Lanschot Kempen Investment Banking agreed to combine their equities businesses into an equal joint venture as they seek to broaden stock coverage and increase heft in their markets.】

item.title: 瑞银称甲骨文债务 "不太可能 "触发评级下调至垃圾级
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，尽管甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）为扩大其人工智能推进计划而借款数百亿美元，但该公司在短期内可能会维持其投资级债券评级。【原文：Oracle Corp. will likely maintain its investment-grade bond rating in the near term despite borrowing tens of billions of dollars to expand its artificial-intelligence push, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 丰业银行首席执行官认为 "特朗普主义 "有利于增长
item.description: 丰业银行首席执行官斯科特-汤姆森（Scott Thomson）表示，拉美地区的政治右倾化以及美国在该地区影响力的上升将使丰业银行的国际业务受益。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia’s international business could benefit from a rightward political shift in Latin America alongside rising US influence in the region, Chief Executive Officer Scott Thomson said.】

item.title: 债券交易员在期货市场押下有史以来最大一笔美联储基金赌注
item.description: 周二，就在一系列可能影响美国利率预期的关键美国劳动力数据公布前几天，美联储基金期货市场出现了创纪录规模的大宗交易。【原文：A record-sized block trade was placed in the fed funds futures market Tuesday, just days ahead of a key set of US labor data that could shape US interest-rate expectations.】

item.title: 康卡斯特旗下 NBC 出售冬奥会广告库存
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）旗下的 NBC 环球公司（NBCUniversal）在即将到来的冬奥会上已经没有剩余的广告位，这表明在该公司为下个月包括超级碗（Super Bowl LX）和 NBA 全明星赛（NBA All-Star Game）在内的一系列体育赛事做准备时，对广告位的需求量很大。【原文：Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal has no remaining ad spots available for the upcoming Winter Olympics, signaling high demand as the company prepares for a whirlwind of sporting events next month including Super Bowl LX and the NBA All-Star Game.】

item.title: iPhone Air 背后的苹果设计师加入人工智能初创公司 Hark
item.description: 帮助设计 iPhone Air 的前苹果公司设计师正在加入人工智能初创公司 Hark，这也是该公司吸引硅谷人才的举措之一。【原文：The former Apple Inc. designer who helped create the iPhone Air is joining AI startup Hark, part of a push by that company to attract Silicon Valley talent.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉不断减少的石油储量威胁石油生产
item.description: 据海事情报公司 Kpler Ltd.称，随着储油罐接近满负荷，许多船只为躲避美国海军封锁而避开加勒比海水域，委内瑞拉的石油产量有可能在几周内严重下降。【原文：Venezuelan oil production is at risk of severe decline within weeks as storage tanks approach full capacity and many ships steer clear of Caribbean waters to avoid a US naval blockade, according to maritime intelligence firm Kpler Ltd.】

item.title: 150 亿美元顾问称急于投资委内瑞拉是 "疯狂 "行为
item.description: CV Advisors 首席执行官表示，尼古拉斯-马杜罗下台后，投资委内瑞拉的热情突然高涨是 "荒谬的"，在恢复民主和法治之前，不会出现任何有意义的机会。【原文：The sudden rush of interest to invest in Venezuela after the removal of Nicolas Maduro is “ridiculous” and no meaningful opportunities will arise until the restoration of democracy and rule of law, according to the chief executive officer of CV Advisors.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 公司首席执行官称委内瑞拉局势变化对炼油企业有利
item.description: 美国最大的炼油商之一认为，委内瑞拉石油工业的潜在重新开放将极大地促进依赖重质原油的燃料制造商的发展。【原文：One of the largest US oil refiners sees a potential reopening of Venezuela’s oil industry as a major boost to fuel-makers that rely on heavier crude grades.】

item.title: 太空、人工智能和加密货币候选企业引领今年美国 IPO 看点
item.description: 美国首次公开募股市场正准备迎接一轮交易热潮，其规模可能会赶上甚至超过大流行病时期的记录，其中包括科技、金融和加密货币领域最受关注的一些私营公司，而且可能是有史以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：The US initial public offering market is bracing for a rush of deals that could rival or even top the pandemic-era record, with a lineup including some of the most closely watched private companies in technology, finance and crypto – and potentially the biggest listing of all time.】
